column.Name: PlanningMaterialDrop
column.lookupquery: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 0 as Value, '' as Text UNION SELECT 1 as Value, '' as Text) t

column.Name: MaterialType
column.lookupquery: SELECT ComponentTypeID, ComponentDescription FROM pComponentType WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY ComponentOrder

column.Name: A
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom12 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: UOM
column.lookupquery: SELECT UOM, UOMValue FROM UOM order by UOMSort

column.Name: CurrencyType
column.lookupquery: SELECT DISTINCT CurrencyType, CurrencyType as CurrencyTypeName FROM sExchangeRateItem WHERE CurrencyType IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CurrencyType

column.Name: P
column.lookupquery: SELECT CountryCode, CountryName FROM uCountry Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CountryName

column.Name: S
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom8 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY Custom
